title: Land for sale in Y junction Negombo
details:
Only 100 M to Y Junction. 10 minutes to Negombo town. Highly residential area but peace and quiet environment. 12 ft wide road to land. Walking distance to Diwulapitiya -Negombo bus root. Walking distance to Cargills super market. Very convenient location. International and Government schools within 10 minutes distance.
Please contact 0776605202
